name: The Cranston Manor Adventure
overview: The Cranston Manor Adventure is a text adventure game that takes place in a deserted mansion. The mansion is full of treasure but also many strange and dangerous creatures. The objective of the game is simply to find the mansion and get all the treasure (sixteen in total) out of the house which will lead to a perfect score being given. The player explores the house with the use of an android which is controlled by typing in two word commands made up of verbs and nouns such as "go north" and "get crowbar".
